name: Avenida Paulista
description: Paulista Avenue is one of the most famous tourist attractions of São Paulo. This avenue is a shopping paradise, with a diversity of commercial shops and stores. It also has a range of restaurants for gastronomy lovers, and on Sundays, it's a family zone where cars are prohibited.

name: Liberdade
address: Praça da Liberdade, São Paulo - Brazil
description: Liberdade neighborhood is a traditional Asian place in the city, where tourists can sightsee, visit the Busshinji Temple, eat oriental food, and have a cultural experience.

name: Museu Catavento
address: Av Mercúrio, s/n - Pq Dom Pedro II, Centro, São Paulo - Brazil
description: Catavento Museum is great entertainment for children and adults. It contains a variety of science and technology collections that are worth visiting. Free entrance every Tuesday.

name: Museu do Ipiranga
address: Rua dos Patriotas, 100, Ipiranga, São Paulo - Brazil
description: Ipiranga Museum contains the largest collection of Brazilian independence items, from clothing to weapons. Its outside garden is free and a perfect place to rest and take pictures, with lots of monuments.

name: Parque do Ibirapuera
address: Av. Pedro Álvares Cabral, s/n - Vila Mariana - SP
description: Ibirapuera Park has 158 hectares and is one of the biggest tourist attractions in Latin America. Visitors can practice sports, dance, have picnics, see animals, appreciate nature, and much more.

name: Santander Tower
address: R. João Brícola, 24 - Centro Histórico de São Paulo, São Paulo - Brazil
description: With 35 floors, this historic building preserves its history. It's not only a place to sightsee and have a marvelous breakfast, but it also offers a skating rink on the 21st floor, cooking classes on the 28th floor, and much more.

name: Municipal Theater
address: Praça Ramos de Azevedo, s/nº Sé, São Paulo - Brazil
description: With over 113 years of history, this magnificent building has hosted great orchestras and plays and remains a great place to visit and listen to classical music. Free tours can be scheduled on the website.

name: Terraço Itália
address: Av. Ipiranga, 344, 41º andar, Centro, São Paulo - Brazil
description: Terraço Itália is one of the most popular haute cuisine restaurants in São Paulo, located on the 41st floor with a breathtaking view. It offers a premium experience worth the price.
